Room.Name: The Tomb of Achunter
Room.ShortDescription: You see a clean, lit room which is the final resting place of Achunter.
Room.LongDescription: A sense of peace overwhelms you as you enter the room. The undead of the Necropolis seem unable to contaminate the tomb with their presence. A soft glow emits from the center of the the room. Upon closer examination, you see the actual body of Achunter himself, levitating from the floor. Suprisingly, his body shows no signs of decay and he seems to be in a state of sleep rather than the cold trance of death. In his lifetime, no creature in the whole of Oceancrest could slay him and in the end, only an intangible force known only as the "The Erasure" took his life.
